sentences.en: There is no celebration of the Eucharist on this day.
sentences.cn: 有没有庆祝圣体圣事的这一天。

sentences.en: Only after someone joins the church, then they go up for the Eucharist.
sentences.cn: 只有加入教会的人，他们才可以去领圣体。

sentences.en: By the way, if we get baptized we certainly can't take the Eucharist because that's eating meat.
sentences.cn: 顺便说一句，如果受洗了，我们不能接受圣餐，因为那得吃肉。
